item.title: Comment on BOOK – Bug Bounty Write Ups collection – Omar Espino by Shane
item.dc:creator: Shane
item.description:
Hello,
I want to purchase your book with btc but I can't sent 2 $ with address because of I used coinbase. Coinbase can only send with email for low amount.Can I get your btc email?
Thanks
item.content:encoded:
Hello,

I want to purchase your book with btc but I can’t sent 2 $ with address because of I used coinbase.
Coinbase can only send with email for low amount.Can I get your btc email?

Thanks

item.title: Comment on WRITE UP – GOOGLE BUG BOUNTY: LFI ON PRODUCTION SERVERS in “springboard.google.com” – $13,337 USD by Binamra
item.dc:creator: Binamra
item.description: Hey bro i am also learning bug bounty. It's been about 6 months. What i do is directly hunt on website. Don't know much about recon, can you explain little on how to do recon because haven't go more then 3 valid bugs i think this is because not doing any recon and others things.. Any tips bro ?
item.content:encoded: Hey bro i am also learning bug bounty. It’s been about 6 months. What i do is directly hunt on website. Don’t know much about recon, can you explain little on how to do recon because haven’t go more then 3 valid bugs i think this is because not doing any recon and others things.. Any tips bro ?
